text: Mach ave, Jisasɨv mbɨ sezɨrmen aiampɨra han erere isupɨr Galili uhɨmɨŋun omŋgɨmar. Avav Jisasɨv mbɨkɨr sezɨrɨh ya sɨkanj. Handɨv mbɨ ndɨŋ erokare kamar. Amɨ wɨram emŋgavaŋg kamŋgɨmɨn amar. Jisasɨv mbah handɨh ñɨñmbɨri arar kamŋgɨmɨn amar. Ave mbɨ ndɨŋ kamar. Wɨramɨnd Nor han wɨram kɨrand oman insɨŋ ŋgamɨndɨramŋgi amar. Ave ndɨn mamta orɨmŋgɨz mandari amar. Mbɨ ndɨn mamta orɨŋgamɨndɨramŋgiaŋg, kɨrɨm mbɨ watɨm yuŋk undɨmapam haŋ ekwaŋg ŋaiahandari amar.
